creator: mhilpert@gmx.de
text:
Xalan has it: org.apache.xalan.Version.getVersion()
Xerces has it: org.apache.xerces.impl.Version.getVersion()
FOP has it: org.apache.fop.apps.Version.getVersion()

but Log4J doesn't have it. Would be nice to have a Version.getVersion() also 
for the Log4J API. :-)

creator: mprice@atl.lmco.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 17862 ***
